lead_paragraph: The country’s prime minister returned abruptly to Bangkok and well-wishers waited at the hospital where the 88-year-old monarch was being treated.

headline.print_headline: Worries Over King’s Health Shake Thailand
headline.main: Worries Over King Bhumibol Adulyadej’s Health Shake Thailand

snippet: The country’s prime minister returned abruptly to Bangkok and well-wishers waited at the hospital where the 88-year-old monarch was being treated....
abstract: Thailand's Prime Min Prayuth Chan-ocha returns to Bangkok abruptly due to concerns about health of King Bhumibol Adulyadej, long a unifying figure in country; Thai stocks fall sharply on news of king's hospitalization.
